definition: middle/center/right in the middle or center/nub
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to hit the nail on the head (idiom)

sentences.english: When wrist flexion simulated, the frequency of action potential waveform of median and ulnar nerve was higher.
sentences.chinese: 模擬腕屈時以正中神經和尺神經電位頻率略高。

sentences.english: Sternotomy open chest operations always lead to anterior mediastinitis, in which symptoms are often slight.
sentences.chinese: 正中開胸手術後均導致前縱隔炎症，症狀一般較輕。

sentences.english: The arrow went straight and hit the eye of the bird.
sentences.chinese: 箭筆直的飛出去，正中小鳥的那隻眼睛。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the skin incision of the median sternotomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索胸骨正中劈開徑路理想的皮膚切口。

sentences.english: and so it's a really central location.

sentences.chinese: 正中的門呀地開了一半。

sentences.english: That outdoor job is the one after his own heart.
sentences.chinese: 這份戶外工作正中他的下懷。

sentences.english: And in the center of the frame is this bright pink tongue and open mouth.
sentences.chinese: 在畫面的正中，是桃紅色的舌頭和張開的嘴。

sentences.english: These are any planes passing through the body at right angles to both the median and coronal planes.
sentences.chinese: 與正中面和冠狀面呈直角的任何平面。

sentences.english: AP dural sac diameter on axial and midsagittal images showed a similar tendency.
sentences.chinese: 前後徑在軸位和正中矢狀位上呈現相似的變化趨勢。

sentences.english: The arrow hit the target dead center.
The archer's shot was a perfect bull's-eye.
sentences.chinese: 射手的那一箭正中靶心。

sentences.english: The length of incision was about 60% of routine median sternotomy.
sentences.chinese: 切口長度約爲常規胸骨正中切口的60%。

sentences.english: He placed the roses in the centre of the dining-room table.
sentences.chinese: 他把玫瑰放在餐廳桌子正中間。

sentences.english: The newly-discovered planet g, however, lies right in the middle of the habitable zone.
sentences.chinese: 然而，新發現的行星g恰好位於宜居帶正中區域。

sentences.english: "Here, unicorn, " said the man, and he pulled up a lily and gave it to him.
sentences.chinese: 他說獨角獸的前額正中有一隻金色的犄角。

definition: right in the midpoint/a bull's eye/to hit the nail on the head
